title: Distrosub
description: Architected and deployed scalable AWS cloud infrastructure (EC2, S3, ECS, RDS, Elasticache) and CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions for a music streaming platform serving thousands of users.

Led Agile sprint planning, conducted code reviews, and mentored a 5-person engineering team while reporting directly to the founder.
toolsUsed: AWS, Node.js, Next.js, TypeScript, CI/CD, GitHub Actions, PWA, React

title: Internship: TechFlouu

title: Internship: Gradient Academy
